title: bhArata mAtA
sahitya:
bhArata mAtA paripUrNa sutantrameiduvALO


caraNam 1   AraNam Agamam Adi kalaik-kaDal Azham aLanda
 mei jnAniyar mAmunivOraiyum Inra nam
  caraNam 2    jAti matangaL anatamuNDAyinum tAyin vilanginait-
 taghartteriya oru manat-tozhu ezhuvarO
  caraNam 3    vITTinuL vandOr ennATTavarEnum pAlUTTit-
 tAlATTi shIrATTi vaLarkkum irakkam mighunda nam
